name: Multiverse Mercenaries
description:
• Made by me, Matthew Diamond. I am a 17-year-old high school senior making a passion project in conjunction with Curios Cardinals
  • Curios Cardinals is a start-up company that sets up students with college-age students to work on passion projects
  • We hope you enjoy! We really appreciate you playing our game. Please leave feedback! Feel free to reach out to our email or our Twitter!

NOTE: MULTIVERSE MERCENARIES DOES NOT WORK ON MAC YET MAC VERSION WILL BE UP IN ABOUT A WEEK
